metadata.synopsis: Japanese scientists create a robotic creature to fight a destructive monster.
metadata.genre: Action & Adventure/Art House & International/Horror/Science Fiction & Fantasy

reviews: This is the best of the Millennium films, and may be the only one to establish a continuity.
It's not the best Godzilla ever, but I still wish this version had taken off beyond one sequel.
A serviceable movie, but overall not a very fun one.
Everyone loves a good rasslin' match between giant monsters, and that's something that this updated, modernized, new and improved Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla certainly delivers.
